/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the city's daily life. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The roads are filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the roads, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the presence of vegetation.
